thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com | 10 of 7322
thread.title: Jesse Tanner Photography
thread.title_full: B&H Photo-Video reviewed by Jesse Tanner Photography

author: Jesse Tanner Photography
title: Jesse Tanner Photography
text:
I found things on other sites cheaper. What comes with that is trust. I trust this company. I will pay what they ask cause I know I will get what i asked for. This site is easy to use and the company does a great job always.
Just ordered the Canon 6d.
I know it will come on time and perfect.
I know I trust my info with them and it wont get used for anything other than what i asked them to use it for.
This company make you feel safe when ordering and always has a deal.
Thank you B & H for being a trusted company to work with for years.
( send me some coupons though ;) )
